name: Summer Program
description: Utilizes LEGO® to explain STEM and robotics concepts. Achieved through combining guided LEGO® projects and structured play time in a learning environment. Visit website for calendar of events

howToGetIt: To Sign up and View Summer Camp Offerings: www.bricktech.org/san-francisco-lego-camps
